world_lore: The city hums with secrets—every flickering neon sign another confession waiting to be heard.
Rain-slick cobblestones remember every deal that ever went south in this part of town.
Cigarette smoke curls through the blinds like a whisper, promising trouble on the other side.
Detectives vanish in this city, not because of bullets, but because they ask the wrong questions.
Some nights the moon stays hidden; even the sky knows better than to witness what happens here.

openers: {user} pushes open the agency door and finds a {monster} leaning on their desk like it owns the place.
Down a crooked alley lit by one buzzing streetlamp, {user} squares up against a {monster}.
{user}'s stakeout ends when the sedan door opens and a {monster} steps out with bad intentions.
A tip scrawled on a cocktail napkin leads {user} to a midnight rendezvous with a {monster}.
The police tape flutters in the wind as {user} realizes the real threat is the {monster} still lurking nearby.
actions: {user} adjusts their fedora, thumb brushes the safety, and stares the {monster} down.
{user} mutters a dry quip, flashes the badge, and moves in on the {monster}.
Knuckles cracked and trench coat flaring, {user} makes the first move on the {monster}.
{user} studies the {monster}'s tell—a twitch, a glance—and prepares to strike first.
The city taught {user} to trust their instincts; they slip into the neon haze after the {monster}.

detective.description: A hardboiled private eye with a map of the city's sins etched into their memory.
actions: {user} keeps their silhouette framed in the doorway, revolver steady on the {monster}.
The case files whisper clues as {user} pieces together the {monster}'s next move.
This ain't their first tail; {user} already has the {monster} pegged.

reporter.description: An ink-stained sleuth chasing the byline that blows the whole city wide open.
actions: {user} flips open a battered notebook, every scribble a leverage point against the {monster}.
{user} calls in a favor at the Tribune and exposes the {monster}'s cover story.
The public needs the truth, and {user} will drag it out of the {monster} if they have to.

fixer.description: A connected operator who knows which palms to grease and which shins to break.
actions: {user} makes a quiet call; by the time it connects, the {monster} is already surrounded.
{user} flashes a knowing grin—they've got dirt on the {monster}'s entire outfit.
Years of favors pay off when {user}'s network closes the trap on the {monster}.

injuries.name: Pistol Whipped
injuries.description: Someone got the drop on you - your head is ringing like church bells.

injuries.name: Knife Wound
injuries.description: A blade found its mark in the alley. You're bleeding but still standing.

injuries.name: Bourbon Hangover
injuries.description: That bottle seemed like a good idea last night. It wasn't.

injuries.name: Cigarette Burn
injuries.description: They used you as an ashtray during the interrogation.

theme.website_footer_tagline: In this city, everyone has secrets...

world_lore: The rain never stops washing the sins of this city down the gutter drains.
Every dame that walks into your office has trouble written all over her, but some are worth the trouble.
In this town, the cops are on the take and the criminals are better dressed than the politicians.
The neon sign outside flickers like a dying heartbeat, illuminating the perpetual darkness below.
Some cases start with a dame and a sob story - this one starts with a corpse and a mystery.

openers: {user} walks into a smoke-filled office and finds a {monster} waiting for them.
The rain pounds the pavement as {user} confronts a {monster} in a dark alley.
{user} follows a trail of cigarette butts and broken promises to a {monster}.
The neon sign reflects off wet streets as {user} faces down a {monster}.
{user} pours a stiff drink and prepares to deal with a {monster} the only way they know how.
actions: {user} reaches for their piece and gets ready to deal with the {monster}.
{user} checks their ammo and squares off against the {monster}.
With a grim determination, {user} prepares to put the {monster} out of business.
{user} sizes up the {monster} - this isn't going to be pretty.
{user} cracks their knuckles and prepares to have a little chat with the {monster}.

actions: {user} pulls out their trusty revolver and aims steady at the {monster}.
{user} dusts off their trench coat and confronts the {monster} with steely resolve.
With years of experience, {user} anticipates the {monster}'s every move.

reporter.description: An investigative journalist who's not afraid to get their hands dirty for the big story.
actions: {user} pulls out their press pass and camera, ready to expose the {monster}.
{user} jots down notes while sizing up the {monster} for tomorrow's headline.
The public deserves to know the truth about this {monster}, and {user} will make sure they do.

insider.description: Someone who knows the streets from the inside - ex-cop, ex-con, or just survived.
actions: {user} uses their street smarts to get the drop on the {monster}.
{user} calls in a favor from an old friend to handle the {monster}.
You learn a few things living in this city, and {user} knows just how to deal with a {monster}.

theme.name: december_shopping
theme.website_subtitle: üéÑ Brave the malls and conquer the queues üéÅ

theme.website_footer_tagline: The perfect gift is out there... somewhere

world_lore: The mall speakers play the same six songs on endless repeat, a soundtrack to desperation and determination.
Parking lots stretch into infinity, each row more crowded than the last, every spot a mirage.
Returns lines snake through stores like patient serpents, receipts clutched in sweaty hands.
Online shopping promised convenience, but the delivery windows lie and packages vanish into the void.
The perfect gift exists somewhere in this chaos - you just have to find it before someone else does.

openers: {user} navigates through crowded aisles and encounters {monster} blocking the way to the toy section.
While waiting in the return line, {user} spots {monster} reaching for the last item on the shelf.
{user} checks their shopping list one more time before confronting {monster} at the checkout.
The holiday music crescendos as {user} rounds the corner to find {monster} guarding the gift wrap station.
{user} braves the parking lot chaos only to discover {monster} claiming the last available space.
actions: {user} grabs their shopping cart and prepares to navigate around {monster}.
{user} clutches their coffee tighter and steels themselves against {monster}.
With determination born of desperation, {user} refuses to let {monster} ruin their shopping trip.
{user} checks their budget one more time before dealing with {monster}.
{user} takes a deep breath and channels their inner holiday spirit to overcome {monster}.

planner.description: An organized shopper with color-coded lists and a battle-tested strategy.
actions: {user} consults their meticulously organized spreadsheet before engaging {monster}.
{user} cross-references their shopping list and budget calculator while facing {monster}.
With military precision, {user} executes their pre-planned route around {monster}.

procrastinator.description: Someone who thrives on deadline pressure and last-minute inspiration.
actions: {user} frantically checks their phone for gift ideas while confronting {monster}.
{user} remembers they forgot someone on their list just as {monster} appears.
Fueled by panic and peppermint lattes, {user} charges headlong at {monster}.

bargain_hunter.description: A deal-seeking expert who knows every coupon code and clearance rack.
actions: {user} whips out a stack of coupons and promotional codes to deal with {monster}.
{user} spots a 'Manager's Special' sign and uses it to distract {monster}.
With the skill of a seasoned deal-hunter, {user} navigates around {monster} to the clearance section.

injuries.name: Paper Cut
injuries.description: Gift wrapping has drawn blood - the paper cuts sting with every movement.

injuries.name: Sore Feet
injuries.description: Hours of mall walking have left your feet screaming for mercy.

injuries.name: Stress Headache
injuries.description: The combination of crowds, noise, and pressure has resulted in a pounding headache.

injuries.name: Cookie Burn
injuries.description: A baking mishap has left you with a painful burn. Should have used oven mitts.

injuries.name: Wallet Strain
injuries.description: Your wallet feels so light it hurts. The financial stress is weighing on you.

bosses.name: The Grinch
bosses.description: A green menace stealing joy from the season

bosses.name: Krampus
bosses.description: The dark enforcer of naughty list justice

bosses.name: Black Friday

discovers a trail of glitter leading away

injury: 🎄 A gift from the naughty list.
🎄 You hear distant sleigh bells... and they're getting closer.
win: 🎄 The holiday spirit won't last forever...

world_lore: The network is old. Older than the concrete and steel that house it. They say it dreams of dial-up tones.
Some data packets never reach their destination. They just... wander. Ghosts in the machine.
Firewalls were originally built to keep things out. Now, some say they're to keep something *in*.

openers: {user} traces a corrupted data line into a forgotten server room, seeking a {monster}.
{user} jacks into a dusty terminal, looking for the signature of a {monster}.
Following a trail of flickering lights, {user} finds the nest of a {monster}.
actions: {user} initiates a debug sequence to try and quarantine the {monster}.
{user} deploys a counter-exploit against the {monster}.
With a burst of static, {user} confronts the {monster} in the digital ether.

warrior.description: A battle-hardened fighter who excels in direct combat.
actions: {user} draws their blade and charges the {monster}.
{user} raises their shield and advances on the {monster}.
With a battle cry, {user} engages the {monster} in melee combat.

mage.description: A wielder of arcane energies and digital sorcery.
actions: {user} weaves a spell of crackling energy at the {monster}.
{user} channels raw data into a devastating hex against the {monster}.
Muttering incantations, {user} unleashes arcane fury upon the {monster}.

rogue.description: A cunning infiltrator who strikes from the shadows.
actions: {user} slips through the shadows to backstab the {monster}.
{user} exploits a vulnerability to strike the {monster} where it hurts.
Moving unseen, {user} delivers a critical blow to the {monster}.

injuries.name: Neural Feedback
injuries.description: Corrupted data has fried your synapses - everything feels fuzzy.

injuries.name: System Overload
injuries.description: Your augments are running hot and need time to cool down.

injuries.name: Code Injection
injuries.description: Malicious code is wreaking havoc on your systems.

injuries.name: Data Corruption
injuries.description: Your memory banks are scrambled - nothing makes sense right now.

injuries.name: Power Drain
injuries.description: Something is leeching energy from your core systems.

theme.name: eldritch_tides
theme.website_subtitle: üúè Trace the glyphs before the stars align üúè
theme.website_footer: üêô Powered by Jeeves IRC Bot | Quest System v6.0 üåä
theme.website_footer_tagline: The tide brings whispers from beneath...

world_lore: The sea breathes in strange rhythms, each wave counting down to an unseen eclipse.
Harbor fog presses close, thick with brine and half-remembered prayers.
Ancient stones surface at low tide, carved with sigils no sane archivist will catalogue.
Eyes gleam beneath the pier; perhaps fish, perhaps something that learned to mimic them.
Sleep offers no refuge‚Äîdreams arrive bloated with saltwater and unfinished sentences.

openers: {user} follows the phosphorescent slick to where a {monster} waits, humming a drowned hymn.
A lighthouse beam sweeps past, revealing a {monster} etched in dripping glyphs before darkness swallows it again.
The dockside radio crackles with static and whispers; when it clears, a {monster} is already in the doorway.
Soggy pages spiral in the wind, spelling coordinates that lead {user} straight to a lurking {monster}.
Black tidepools bubble and pull apart, delivering a {monster} that should have stayed forgotten.
actions: Salt flecks {user}'s coat as they step between realities, striking at the {monster} before it finishes its chant.
{user} traces a sigil in the air; reality buckles and drags the {monster} toward the cold floorboards.
The lantern flickers green when {user} lunges, casting the {monster}'s silhouette into writhing shapes.
Breath held against the stench, {user} drives a rusted harpoon straight through the {monster}'s omen-slick hide.
Tuning fork humming, {user} fractures the silence and the {monster} with a single resonant blow.

occultist.description: A scholar of forbidden tides who stitches sanity together with salt and ink.
actions: {user} murmurs a counter-chant, siphoning the {monster}'s strength into a waiting charm.
Pages whirl around {user}; every torn scrap binds the {monster} tighter to the waking world.
With a vial of phosphor brine, {user} brands the {monster} and it recoils from the burning rune.

harpooner.description: A weathered hunter who knows which knots keep nightmares from surfacing.
actions: {user} coils rope around a rusted harpoon, dragging the {monster} off balance and closer to the abyss.
Barnacles crack under {user}'s boots as they drive cold steel through the {monster}'s shifting form.
Lantern jaw clenched, {user} anchors the {monster} with barbed chains and a whispered warning.

archivist.description: Keeper of sealed stacks, cataloguing every scream so none are forgotten.
actions: {user} snaps open a case file of sigils; each glyph flares and scorches the {monster}.
With unblinking focus, {user} redacts the {monster} from reality one sentence at a time.
Index cards scatter like wards when {user} advances, pinning the {monster} beneath impossible geometry.

injuries.name: Salt-Lunged Cough
injuries.description: Brine floods your throat; every breath tastes like the deep.

injuries.name: Fractured Mindscape
injuries.description: Echoes overlap until you cannot tell which voice is yours.

injuries.name: Inkblot Veins
injuries.description: Veins run black with moving symbols that slow your pulse.

injuries.name: Unblinking Stare
injuries.description: You cannot close your eyes; every blink reveals a new coastline of teeth.

injuries.name: Barnacle Bite
injuries.description: Jagged shells cling to your skin, drinking warmth and will.

bosses.name: The Pallid Admiral
bosses.description: Commander of a drowned fleet that never stopped sailing.

bosses.name: Harbinger of the Deep
bosses.description: A lighthouse-shaped shadow that signals only ruin.

bosses.name: The Sleepless Dreamer
bosses.description: Its ribcage is a tidepool; its heartbeat is a foghorn.

clue_messages: finds a barnacle-clung chart scribbled with impossible currents
pieces together a chant carved into driftwood and teeth
uncovers a tide table that predicts voices instead of water levels
salvages a compass that only points toward whispered regrets
drains a flood of ink to reveal coordinates that do not exist

injury: ü¶ë The tide drags you under for a moment longer than comfort allows.
ü¶ë Salt crusts your lips; something laughs between the waves.
ü¶ë You cough seawater and syllables that are not your own.
win: ü¶ë The sea goes still for one heartbeat. Then it listens again.
ü¶ë Lanterns flicker green; the depths mark your name in bubbles.
ü¶ë The horizon tilts. The deep remembers this insult.
